import { useState, useEffect, Children } from "react"; import * as BooksAPI from '../BooksAPI'; const Book = (props) => { const [bookList, setBookList] = useState([]); useEffect(() =>{ const loadBooks = async () =>{ const res = await BooksAPI.getAll(); setBookList(res); }; loadBooks(); }, []); const changeShelf = async (book, shelf) =>{ const res = await BooksAPI.update(book, shelf); const res2 = await BooksAPI.getAll(); setBookList(res2); } return (
{showSearchPage ? (
Close
    ) : (

    MyReads

    Currently Reading

      {bookList.map((book, index) => { if(book.shelf === "currentlyReading"){ return(
    1. {book.title}
      {book.authors}
      2. ) } })}

    Want To Read

      {bookList.map((book, index) => { if(book.shelf === "wantToRead"){ return(
    1. {book.title}
      {book.authors}
      2. ) } })}

    Read

      {bookList.map((book, index) => { if(book.shelf === "read"){ return(
    1. {book.title}
      {book.authors}
      2. ) } })}
    Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default Book;
